T06asycsaru:0: pāpaṃ na kuryān manasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke /
T06asycsaru:1: riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ duḥkhaṃ na seveta anarthasaṃhitam // Śag_1.1
T06asycsaru:3: ākhyeyam aparijñāya yogam āyānti mṛtyunaḥ // Śag_2.1
T06asycsaru:4: ākhyeyaṃ tu parijñāya ākhyātāraṃ na manyate /
T06asycsaru:5: tad vai na vidyate tasya vadeyur yena taṃ pare // Śag_2.2
T06asycsaru:6: samo viśeṣa uta vāpi hīno yo manyate sa vivadeta tena /
T06asycsaru:7: vidhātraye 'smin na vikampate yaḥ samo viśiṣṭaś ca na tasya bhavati // Śag_2.3
T06asycsaru:8: ācchidya tṛṣṇām iha nāmarūpe prahāya mānaṃ ca na saṃgam eti /
T06asycsaru:9: taṃ śāntadhūmam anighaṃ nirāśaṃ nādrākṣus te devamanuṣyaloke /
T06asycsaru:12: aṃga me gautama brūhi śāntiṃ tvam anukaṃpayā // Śag_3.1
T06asycsaru:14: nimittaṃ varjyatāṃ tasmāc chubhaṃ rāgopasaṃhitaṃ // Śag_3.2
T06asycsaru:15: aśubhāṃ bhāvaya sadā tvam ekāgraḥ susamāhitaḥ /
T06asycsaru:16: nirvāpayāśu rāgāgniṃ dahyase mā punaḥ punaḥ // Śag_3.3
T06asycsaru:18: smṛtiṃ kāyagatāṃ kṛtvā nirvedabahulo bhava // Śag_3.4
T06asycsaru:23: kathaṃdhyāyī vipulāṃ kāmatṛṣṇāṃ tīrṇo bhavaty apratilabdhayoktraḥ // Śag_4.1
T06asycsaru:24: praśrabdhakāyaḥ suvimuktacitto hy asaṃskurvan smṛtimān akopyaḥ
T06asycsaru:25: ājñāya dharmam avitarkadhyāyī kopaspṛhāstyānadoṣaiḥ viyuktaḥ // Śag_4.2
T06asycsaru:27: evaṃdhyāyī vipulāṃ kāmatṛṣṇāṃ tīrṇo bhavaty apratilabdhayoktraḥ // Śag_4.3
T06asycsaru:28: nityotrasto hy ayaṃ loko nityodvignā iyaṃ prajā /
T06asycsaru:30: yadi kiṃcid anutrastaṃ pṛṣṭa ācakṣva tan mama // Śag_5.1
T06asycsaru:32: nānyatra sarvasaṃtyāgān mokṣaṃ paśyāmi devate // Śag_5.2
T06asycsaru:35: kenābhivarṇā janatā praṇītā mārgaś ca nairyāṇikataḥ prayuktaḥ /
T06asycsaru:36: kutra sthitaḥ kutra ca śikṣamāṇo nāyaṃ martyaḥ paralokād bibheti // Śag_6.1
T06asycsaru:37: yaḥ śīlavāñ jñānavān bhāvitātmā samāhitaḥ smṛtimān ṛjugataś ca /
T06asycsaru:38: sarve 'sya śokajvarathāḥ prahīṇāḥ samyaksmṛto yasya cittaṃ vimuktaṃ // Śag_6.2
T06asycsaru:39: tenābhivarṇā janatā praṇītā mārgaś ca nairyāṇikataḥ prayuktaḥ /
T06asycsaru:40: atra sthitaḥ atra ca śikṣamāṇo nāyaṃ martyaḥ paralokād bibheti // Śag_6.3
T06asycsaru:41: kathaṃ yaśasvī bhavati kathaṃ bhavati bhogavān /
T06asycsaru:42: kathaṃ kīrtim avāpnoti kathaṃ mitrāṇi vindati // Śag_7.1
T06asycsaru:43: śīlād yaśasvī bhavati dānād bhavati bhogavān /
T06asycsaru:44: satyena kīrtim āpnoti dadan mitrāṇi vindati // Śag_7.2
T06asycsaru:45: kutaḥ sarā nivartante kutra vartma na vartate /
T06asycsaru:46: kutra duḥkhasukhaṃ loke niḥśeṣam uparudhyate // Śag_8.1
T06asycsaru:47: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ tathā ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manas tathā /
T06asycsaru:48: yatra nāma ca rūpaṃ ca niḥśeṣam uparuhyate // Śag_8.2
T06asycsaru:49: tataḥ sarā nivartante tatra vartma na vartate /
T06asycsaru:50: tatra duḥkhasukhaṃ loke niḥśeṣam uparudhyate // Śag_8.3
T06asycsaru:51: kena svid oghaṃ tarati kenottarati cārṇavaṃ /
T06asycsaru:52: duḥkhaṃ tyajati kena svit kena svit pariśudhyati // Śag_9.1
T06asycsaru:53: śraddhayā tarati hy ogham apramādena cārṇavaṃ /
T06asycsaru:54: vīryeṇa duḥkhaṃ tyajati prajñayā pariśudhyati // Śag_9.2
T06asycsaru:55: ka etam oghaṃ tarati rātriṃdivam atandritaḥ /
T06asycsaru:56: anālambe 'pratiṣṭhe ca ko gaṃbhīre na sīdati // Śag_10.1
T06asycsaru:60: anālambe 'pratiṣṭhe ca sa gaṃbhīre na sīdati // Śag_10.3
T06asycsaru:61: rāgadveṣau bhagavan kinnidānāv aratiratī romaharṣaḥ kuto 'yam /
T06asycsaru:62: kutaḥsamutthāś ca mano vitarkāḥ kumārakā dhātrīm ivāśrayante // Śag_11.1
T06asycsaru:64: pṛthagviṣaktāḥ kāmeṣu mālutā vā latā vane // Śag_11.2
T06asycsaru:65: rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca itonidānāv aratiratī romaharṣaḥ ito 'yaṃ /
T06asycsaru:66: itaḥsamutthāś ca mano vitarkāḥ kumārakā dhātrīm ivāśrayante // Śag_11.3
T06asycsaru:67: ye tān prajānanti yatonidānāṃs te tāṃ janā yakṣa vinodayanti /
T06asycsaru:68: ta arṇavaṃ saṃpratarantīhaugham atīrṇapūrvam apunarbhavāya // Śag_11.4
T06asycsaru:70: kāmānāṃ viprahāṇārthaṃ na hi kāṃkṣaty asau bhavaṃ // Śag_12.1
T06asycsaru:71: sa kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsti kṛtārtho brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // Śag_12.2
T06asycsaru:72: yāvan na gādhaṃ labhate na tīram āyūhate sarvagātraiḥ sa tāvat /
T06asycsaru:73: tīraṃ tu labdhveha saṃtiṣṭhati sthale nāyūhate pāragato nirucyate // Śag_12.3
T06asycsaru:74: eṣopamā dāmale brāhmaṇasya kṣīṇāsravo yo nipako dhyānalābhī /
T06asycsaru:75: sarve 'sya śokajvarathāḥ prahīṇāḥ samyaksmṛto yasya cittaṃ vimuktam // Śag_12.4
T06asycsaru:81: yathā kathaṃ tvaṃ bhikṣo anālambe apratiṣṭhe ogham atārṣīḥ /
T06asycsaru:82: yathā yathāhaṃ devate āyūhāmi tathā tathā saṃsīdāmi /
T06asycsaru:83: yathā yathā saṃsīdāmi tathā tathā saṃtiṣṭhe /
T06asycsaru:84: yathā yathā saṃtiṣṭhe tathā tathā uhye /
T06asycsaru:85: yathā yathāhaṃ devate nāyūhāmi tathā tathā na saṃsīdāmīti vistareṇa śuklapakṣo veditavyaḥ // Śag_13
T06asycsaru:87: eko 'raṇye prasṛto dhyāyase tvaṃ vittād vihīna uta vā prārthayānaḥ /
T06asycsaru:88: grāmasya vā kiṃcanāgo nv akārṣīḥ kasmāj janena na karoṣi sakhyaṃ
T06asycsaru:89: sakhyaṃ na saṃvidyate kena cit tava // Śag_14.1
T06asycsaru:90: arthāprāptyā hṛdayasyeha śāntir jitveha senāṃ priyaśātarūpaṃ /
T06asycsaru:91: eko dhyāyī sukham asmy anvabhotsaṃ tasmād janena na karomi sakhyaṃ
T06asycsaru:92: sakhyaṃ na saṃvidyate kena cid mama // Śag_14.2
T06asycsaru:94: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham // Śag_15 (cf. Uv 1.3)
T06asycsaru:96: apramattā na mriyante pramattās tu sadā mṛtāḥ // Śag_16 (cf. Uv 4.1)
T06asycsaru:98: bhūyas tṛṣṇā vivardhate sā gāḍhīkurute 'sya bandhanaṃ // Śag_17 (cf. Uv 3.1)
T06asycsaru:100: ātmanaḥ priyakartāraṃ taṃ janaḥ kurute priyaṃ // Śag_18 (cf. Uv 5.24)
T06asycsaru:102: ātmanā tan na kurvīta karmabaddho hi pāpakaḥ // Śag_19 (cf. Uv 9.6)
T06asycsaru:103: subhāṣitaṃ hy uttamam āhur āryāḥ priyaṃ vaden nāpriyaṃ tad dvitīyaṃ /
T06asycsaru:104: satyaṃ vaden nānṛtaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ dharmaṃ vaden nādharmaṃ tat caturtham // Śag_20 (cf. Uv 8.11)
T06asycsaru:105: śraddhātha hrīḥ śīlam athāpi dānaṃ dharmā ime satpuruṣapraśastāḥ /
T06asycsaru:106: etaṃ hi mārgaṃ divigaṃ vadanti etena vai gacchati devalokam // Śag_21 (cf. Uv 10.1)
T06asycsaru:107: śrutvā dharmaṃ vijānāti śrutvā pāpān nivartate /
T06asycsaru:108: śrutvā anarthaṃ tyajati śrutvā prāpnoti nirvṛtim // Śag_22 (cf. Uv 22.6)
T06asycsaru:109: ākāśasamo na lipyate indrakīlapratimo na kaṃpate /
T06asycsaru:110: hrada iva samupetakardame saṃsāre ramate na paṇḍitaḥ // Śag_23 (cf. Uv 17.12)
T06asycsaru:111: ye rūpeṇa pramiṇvanti māṃ ghoṣeṇānuyānti ca /
T06asycsaru:112: cchandarāgavaśopetā na mā jānanti te janāḥ // Śag_24.1 (cf. Uv 22.12)
T06asycsaru:113: adhyātmaṃ ca vijānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati /
T06asycsaru:114: adhyātmaphaladarśī yaḥ sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate // Śag_24.2 (cf. Uv 22.13)
T06asycsaru:115: adhyātmaṃ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati /
T06asycsaru:116: bahirdhāphaladarśī yaḥ so 'pi ghoṣeṇa nīyate // Śag_24.3 (cf. Uv 22.14)
T06asycsaru:117: adhyātmaṃ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati /
T06asycsaru:118: samantāvaraṇo bālaḥ so 'pi ghoṣeṇa nīyate // Śag_24.4 (cf. Uv 22.15)
T06asycsaru:119: adhyātmaṃ ca vijānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati /
T06asycsaru:120: dhīro niḥsaraṇaprajño na sa ghoṣeṇa nīyate // Śag_24.5 (cf. Uv 22.16)
T06asycsaru:122: arajasy arajā bhavati rakto bālo nirucyate // Śag_25 (cf. Uv 16.22)
T06asycsaru:124: yatra rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca māno mrakṣaś ca gāhate // Śag_26 (cf. Uv 16.23)
T06asycsaru:125: kūrmaḥ svake 'ṅgāni yathā kapāle bhikṣur nidadhyān manaso vitarkāni /
T06asycsaru:126: aniśrito 'nyān aviheṭhamānaḥ parinirvṛto nāpavadeta kaṃ cit // Śag_27 (cf. Uv 26.1)
T06asycsaru:127: tulyam atulyaṃ ca saṃbhavaṃ bhavasaṃskāram avāsṛjan muniḥ /
T06asycsaru:128: adhyātmarataḥ samāhita abhinat kośam ivāṇḍasaṃbhavaḥ // Śag_28 (cf. Uv 26.30)
T06asycsaru:129: nāsti kāmasamaḥ paṃko nāsti dveṣasamo grahaḥ /
T06asycsaru:130: nāsti mohasamaṃ jālaṃ nāsti tṛṣṇāsamā nadī // Śag_29 (cf. Uv 29.37)
T06asycsaru:131: ākāśe vai padaṃ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyakaḥ /
T06asycsaru:132: prapañcābhiratā bālā niṣprapañcās tathāgatāḥ // Śag_30 (cf. Uv 29.38)
T06asycsaru:133: sthitiḥ prapaṃcāś ca na santi yasya yaḥ saṃdānaṃ parighaṃ cātivṛttaḥ /
T06asycsaru:134: taṃ nistṛṣṇaṃ muniṃ carantaṃ na vijānāti sadevako 'pi lokaḥ // Śag_31 (cf. Uv 29.51)
T06asycsaru:135: yasya vitarkā vidhūpitā adhyātmam avikalpitā aśeṣaṃ /
T06asycsaru:136: saṃgaṃ so 'tītya rūpasaṃjñāṃ caturyogāpagato na jātim eti // Śag_32 (cf. Uv 29.56)
T06asycsaru:137: dadataḥ puṇyaṃ pravardhate vairaṃ saṃyamato na cīyate /
T06asycsaru:138: kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayatas tu nirvṛtaḥ // Śag_33 (cf. Uv 28.2)
T06asycsaru:142: cittasya dāmanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham // Śag_35 (cf. Uv 31.1)
T06asycsaru:143: cittanimittasya kovidaḥ pravivekasya ca vindate rasaṃ /
T06asycsaru:144: dhyāyī nipakaḥ pratismṛto bhuṃkte prītisukhaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ // Śag_36 (cf. Uv 31.51)
T06asycsaru:145: aśilpajīvī laghur ātmakāmo jitendriyaḥ sarvato vipramuktaḥ /
T06asycsaru:146: anokasārī hy amamo nirāśaḥ kāmān prahāyaikacaro yas sa bhikṣuḥ // Śag_37 (cf. Uv 32.5)
T06asycsaru:148: damayati durdamaṃ cittaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ bravīmy ahaṃ // Śag_38 (cf. Uv 33.55)
T06asycsaru:150: kenāyaṃ nivṛto lokaḥ kenāyaṃ na prakāśate /
T06asycsaru:151: kiṃ cābhilepanaṃ brūṣe kiṃ ca tasya mahad bhayam // Śag_39.1
T06asycsaru:153: jalpābhilepanaṃ brūmi duḥkhaṃ tasya mahad bhayaṃ // Śag_39.2
T06asycsaru:154: sravanti sarvataḥ srotāḥ srotasāṃ kiṃ nivāraṇaṃ /
T06asycsaru:155: srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi kena srotaḥ pidhīyate // Śag_39.3
T06asycsaru:156: yāni srotāṃsi lokasya smṛtiḥ teṣāṃ nivāraṇaṃ /
T06asycsaru:157: srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi prajñayā hi pidhīyate // Śag_39.4
T06asycsaru:158: prajñāyāś ca smṛteś caiva nāmarūpasya sarvaśaḥ /
T06asycsaru:159: ācakṣva pṛṣṭa etan me kutraitad uparudhyate // Śag_39.5
T06asycsaru:160: prajñā caiva smṛtiś caiva nāmarūpaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
T06asycsaru:161: vijñānasya nirodhād dhi atraitad uparudhyate // Śag_39.6
T06asycsaru:163: ācakṣva pṛṣṭa etan me yathātatham asaṃśayaḥ // Śag_39.7
T06asycsaru:164: adhyātaṃ ca bahirdhā ca vedanāṃ nābhinandataḥ /
T06asycsaru:165: evaṃ smṛtasya carato vijñānam uparudhyate // Śag_39.8
T06asycsaru:166: ye ca saṃkhyātadharmāṇo ye ca śaikṣāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ /
T06asycsaru:167: teṣāṃ me nipakasyeryāṃ pṛṣṭaḥ prabrūhi mārṣa // Śag_39.9
T06asycsaru:169: kuśalaḥ sarvadharmeṣu smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet // Śag_39.10
T06asycsaru:171: kāmān kāmāyamānasya tasya cet tat samṛdhyati /
T06asycsaru:172: addhā prītamanā bhavati labdhvā martyo yad īpsitaṃ // Śag_40.1
T06asycsaru:174: te kāmāḥ parihīyaṃte śalyaviddha iva rūpyate // Śag_40.2
T06asycsaru:175: yaḥ kāmāṃ parivarjayati sarpasyeva śirāt padaṃ /
T06asycsaru:176: sa imāṃ viṣaktikāṃ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate // Śag_40.3
T06asycsaru:178: striyo dāsān pṛthakkāmān yo naro hy abhigṛdhyati // Śag_40.4
T06asycsaru:179: abalaṃ vā balīyāṃso mṛdnaṃty enaṃ parisravāḥ /
T06asycsaru:180: tata enaṃ duḥkham anveti bhinnāṃ nāvam ivodakaṃ // Śag_40.5
T06asycsaru:181: yasya tv etat samucchinnaṃ tālamastakavad dhataṃ /
T06asycsaru:182: śokās tasya nivartante udabindur iva puṣkarāt //
T06asycsaru:187: pratyutpannāś ca ye dharmās tatra tatra vipaśyakaḥ /
T06asycsaru:188: asaṃhāryam asaṃkṣobhyaṃ tad vidvān anubṛṃhayet // Śag_41.1
